description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for displaying a list of phrases with search and favorite toggling features. It uses Flutter UI components, state management via Provider, and custom widgets and themes.

classes.name: PhrasesScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget that displays a searchable list of phrases.

classes.name: _PhrasesScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the search query and filtering logic for the PhrasesScreen.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the PhrasesScreen widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the phrases list with search field and favorite toggles.

methods.name: setState
methods.description: Updates the widget state when the search query changes.
